patterns: TELL ME ABOUT TAKING SOIL SAMPLE
What is the technique used in taking soil sample
responses: DEEG 6-9 INCH DEEP `V` SHAPE PIT AND TACKING 500 GM SOIL SAMPLE FOR TESTING SOIL
Dig out a wedge of soil about 6 to 8 inches deep, and set this wedge aside.. Now dig out a half-inch piece of soil from the hole and pour it into your bucket.

patterns: TELL ME SOMETHING ABOUT NUTRIENT MANAGEMENT ?
What are some ways to improve nutrients in soil
responses: SPRAY OF ZINK SULPHATE 5 GRAM +UREA 10 GRAM PER LITER WATER
SPRAY OF SOLUBLE NPK  18:18:18 GRADE 10 GM/LTR WATER
SPRAY OF MULTIPLAX (MICRONUTRIENT) 4 ML PER LITER WATER

patterns: TELL ME HOW TO CONTROL INSECT IN WHEAT
What are some ways to control insects in wheat
responses: You can use fumigants like methyl bromide and magnesium or aluminium phosphide

patterns: GIVE ME SOME INFORMATION ON SUBSIDIES
What are some various subsidy data?
responses: Do you need subsidy value for solar plant, farm pond or pipe line ?
SUBSIDY ON FARM POND = 50% OF TOTAL COST OR 75000/- MAXIMUM
SUBSIDY ON SOLAR PLANT=70% OF TOTAL COST

atterns: Give me some information about cotton
responses: Please Download Crop Darpan App developed by IIT Hydrabad faculty or go on following [website](https://www.cropdarpan.com/cropdarpan/farmer/welcome) .On this platform ,You will get information on which disease do your paddt/cotton crop have and advice on dignostic of your known disease
SUBSIDY ON PIPE LINE= 50% OF TOTAL COST OR 15000/- MAXIMUM
